item.title: Patchy Queen's Lawn causes complaints
item.author: Jason Murugesu,
item.description: The grass on Queen’s Lawn has been suffering greatly due to an excess of events being held on the space, resulting in student complaints. In recent months, it has hosted the drinks reception for Imperial’s Postgraduate Graduation. Heavy rainfall has also caused the grass to be waterlogged. …

item.title: As Tuesday's Brexit vote looms, Imperial left in dark about future
item.author: Jason Murugesu,
item.description: All day the news rumbles on. Theresa May continues to push her Brexit deal, and MPs continue to push back. The truth becomes abundantly clear, that not one politician, nor pundit truly knows what Brexit looks like for the people of this country. In this climate, universities must reassure their …
